2082.subject: ISSM
2082.descrlong: The purpose of this course is to continue the exploration the dynamic historical relationships between cultures and their diverse impacts on the development of math, science, art, astronomy, literature, medicine, law, spirituality, and worldviews, in general from the 17th century to the Present.  These must be compared with the developing importance, from the Renaissance period onward, of the  Neo-Platonic Achemical study of spirituality and healing and the contemporary Western tendency to look to and attempt to incorporate the sacred psycho-spiritual/herbal traditions of the global Indigenous systems above during the from the Renaissance to the present .
